thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com | 2 of 5
thread.title: Lee
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Lee

author: Lee
title: Lee
text: My consultant Jackie Stanley is very engaging, compassionate, knowledgeable, genuine and professional. She helped to make a difficult and stressful situation easy to contend with. She always makes herself available and is very responsive with inquiries and assistance even after my bankruptcy was discharged. It is due to her efforts that I have been able to reestablish my credit and am now in a much better financial position. I would highly recommend David Sklar and associates and Jackie specifically.
